Uses of Class
model.curve.Grade

  • Packages that use Grade 
    Package Description
    controller.graph

    This package contains controllers for graph.
    model.curve

    Model classes for the curve manipulation and calculation for the Grader tool, including adding new grade scales to the curve.
    model.roster

    Model classes for the class management aspects of the Grader tool.
